Properties.Meta_Choice_ServiceWarningMessage: No search index with facetable fields has been created yet. To manage search indexes, go to Administration > Search indexes, or contact your administrator for assistance.
Properties.Meta_Description_Description: [{"Type":1,"Chunks":[{"Value":"To display facetable fields on your site,","Presentation":[]},{"Value":"select the same search index as the one","Presentation":[]},{"Value":"selected in the Search box widget.","Presentation":[]}]}]
[{"Type":1,"Chunks":[{"Value":"Add a name of the facetable field that is","Presentation":[]},{"Value":"visible on your site.","Presentation":[]}]}]
Specify the ranges for generating facets.
Add a label for this range on your site. For example, 2021 - 2022 or May 2022.
Select a step to automatically group values by time period.
Specify a step to automatically generate ranges. For example, if the step is set to 10, generated ranges will be 0 - 10, 10 - 20, 20 - 30, etc. If a step is not set, all values are displayed.
Specify the ranges for generating facets.
Add a label for this range on your site. For example, 5kg - 10kg or above 10kg.
Specify the ranges for generating facets.
Add a label for this range on your site. For example, 5kg - 10kg or above 10kg.
Add text before the values, such as units, currency, etc. For example, $0 - $10, $10 - $20, $20 - $30, etc.
Properties.Validations_StringLengthErrorMsg: Your text must be less than 20 characters

Properties.Meta_Description_Description: Add text after the values, such as units, currency, etc. For example, 0 in - 10 in, 10 in - 20 in, 20 in - 30 in, etc.
Properties.Validations_StringLengthErrorMsg: Your text must be less than 20 characters

Properties.Meta_Description_Description: If enabled, empty fields for entering custom values are displayed on your site.

[{"Type":1,"Chunks":[{"Value":"Specifies whether to collapse facet lists on","Presentation":[]}, {"Value":"your site with more than 10 entries. If 'No'","Presentation":[2]}, {"Value":"is selected, all facets are displayed.","Presentation":[2]}]}]
Custom labels are displayed in the page editor for your convenience. You can change the generic name with a specific one only for this widget.
[{"Type":1,"Chunks":[{"Value":"List of fields to be used in the search facets. These fields must be the same as those specified in the Search results widget.","Presentation":[]}]}]
